entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
